name: Alexandria's Adventure
description:
Explore the island and kill the two bosses to secure Alexandrias place in the Bruised Ego Championship. I tried.

Details: 

Engine: Unity 2020.3.2f1

Total Production Time: ~30 hours

Things that were planned but left out due to time:

-Story

-Characters

-The Tower

-More bosses/enemy types

-Music

-Weapons/Powers specific to Alexandria

Its just a dumb shooting game
